Room.Name: Dirt Road
Room.ShortDescription: You are on a dirt road going through the Chateau Richland Winery fields.
Room.LongDescription: The road has been in use for a long time and is bare of weeds. It is apparently used fairly often. There is a mid-day rest area immediately to the north, and in the distance to the east you see a large grove of trees. Several farm buildings lie to the southwest.
